body:
Pretty stupid but, was trying to edit documentation but couldn't find it.  Isn't the github page for the documentation of [nn.html](https://pytorch.org/docs/master/nn.html) (which inturn contains torch.nn.CrossEntropyLoss) kept [here](https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/1ce5431aaf5318e3f707961337e17924515d02e3/docs/source/nn.rst)

Wasn't able to understand the layout. Will you kindly be able to point me to the right page so that I can edit it and submit a pull request? If its too much pain, ignore please.
